title: FS: Souvenir Postcard Shop of Cleveland Addie Joss
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: Souvenir Postcard Shop of Cleveland Addie Joss
posts.post_content:
No longer available but I’ll leave the pics up.  Helping a friend of mine sell this. 1905 PC785. Raw, postally unused, and rare!  Pm or email me with any questions. Many references available upon request.


[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=150&pictureid=38298[/IMG]


[IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=150&pictureid=38299[/IMG]
Thanks for looking!

Angyale
Fantastic card GLWS, what year would you place on that
Shop was in the Old Arcade in downtown Cleveland. The arcade still exists.

Never seen this one before - wow! nice

Jimmy
